website_summaries.verdict: These sleek boots look good on everyone, but suede could be an issue.
pros: The boots look great on women of all body types

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are not real Steve Madden! This is my third time buying them (The past 2 I bought at the Steve Manden store). When I first tried them on they were way too big and they felt weird. I brought out one of my old pairs and compared them and they are completely different. The sole does not have the stitching that the original ones do and the inside - where the shoe size is different and cheap looking. I was disappointed as these have always been my favorite boots. Save your time. P.S I posted a photo so you can see the difference between the original ones and these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic. Took a day to break in but they're ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Took a day to break in but they're as comfortableas expected for heel height with no platform. They fit perfectly in the calf's, not too baggy and not too tight. I have super thin legs and finding the right fit is always an issue. They stay up nicely as well. No constant pulling up like others I've tried. Also true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Esparza

customer_reviews.title: I am undecided on whether to return them or not
customer_reviews.text: Boots don't have a zipper, just a small string at the top to try and tie tight to keep them up. I tried them on for the first time and they immediately went baggy as I walked around my bedroom. Couldn't keep them up over the knee, they just slid down and looked awful, no matter how hard you try to tie it at the top. Can't wear these with jeans either. Would have been better boots if made with a zipper down the side. Would have helped keep them up more.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: After ordering a different pair of over-the-knee boots, I was unsatisfied, so I decided to order these - great choice! I went with other customers' advice and ordered a size down (I'm usually an 8.5, so I ordered a size 8). I have relatively large "athletic" calfs, and these stretched over them just fine. My thighs are on the average size and the ties in the back really help the boots to stay up. The heels are high but comfortable. Great fit - they are very slimming and look amazing! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots!! Price is totally worth for the quality of these boots. The leg shaft has a slight stretch to them which makes it nice for people like me who have slightly thicker legs. Im 5'5 and the boots come up pretty high onto my thigh. The ties on the back add a cute look as well. Considering buying another pair in a different color as well.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaRodriguez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: I went with the grey because I thought it might tone down the sexy-factor so I could wear these to work, but they are still so darn sexy! I absolutely love them, and am finding every excuse to wear them anytime I go out (yes, I wore them grocery shopping!). One tip, don't wear them for the first time when you'll be on your feet for 4 hours straight ;)
customer_reviews.author: Poozie

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to spend the $$$$ on the SW .... this is the perfect alternative.... they are comfy, feels like suede... sexy, they stay up well on the leg easy to get on! They do. It look cheap... I never buy off brands or inexpensive shoes ever ... I have several SW Boots and couldn't justify spending another 700-800 on boots.... thanks you Steve Madden !!! Gorgeous!! Is right!!! Check out the YouTube comparison... I am sold... also Kaitlyn Pan... makes an exact dupe!
customer_reviews.author: Fashion Forward

customer_reviews.title: A little too loose
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. It looked really good on but wouldn't stay up. I would have had to spend my time pulling then up all the time. If you have muscular legs, then they would be great! Don't buy if your legs are real skinny unless you are ok with them bunching up some. They really are nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots! They're just too exact. I should've ordered a half or whole size larger. They're a bit narrow. I usually wear a 10W and i ordered a 10. But they're exactly like the picture and of good quality. They do fall down a little after sitting awhile. I had to keep tying them tighter. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CajunSpice

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: Lovely boot but the toe box is too tight and the size 10 runs small and narrow. I wear a 9.5/10 so I was shocked that the shoe was too small. I don't know if I got the wrong size or what but I'll have to give it away since it is still a good shoe. I'll be refraining from buying Steve Madden shoes online to prevent this from happening again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think they’re real Steve Maddens. Look cheap, ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think they’re real Steve Maddens. Look cheap, feel cheap. The foot part of the boot is small but really big up the thigh. Had to lay down and have someone tie these as tight as they could and I was still pulling them up all night.
customer_reviews.author: Jane doe

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for a more comfortable sole. Wore it a few times before I ...
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for a more comfortable sole. Wore it a few times before I took it on an extended walk around the park and it was pretty painful. I'll probably keep them because they look so good but wont take them out to long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie

customer_reviews.title: she loves wearing them & I love seeing her in them
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my girl, she loves wearing them & I love seeing her in them. According to her they are comfortable & fitted as expected, she is 5'9 mostly legs & they come up to mid thigh area.
customer_reviews.author: Federale_5150

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Super sexy. They fit over thick socks and jeans, they don't hurt my feet like walking around in heels does to me. They don't have a lot of traction on the bottom so watch out in icy weather. They also don't have a zipper so it's easy to slip on but a pain in the butt to take off. Other than that I'm obsessed with them, they make me look taller and slimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... of dust and if you have dogs is even worst, but that's not the worst part
customer_reviews.text: The material of the boots collects the minimum amount of dust and if you have dogs is even worst, but that's not the worst part. they don't hold on the leg even if you tied them to the max. I purchased another pair (different model) of Steven Madden boots and the held up way better than this style.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: truly a gorgeous boot! ive received several compliments when ive worn the boots. the boots are comfortable (considering the heel height) and I have been able to leisurely walk wearing these most of the day
customer_reviews.author: just peachy

customer_reviews.title: Black 8 US
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots. Fit as expected. I have athletic calves and they fit perfectly but I can wear them with leggings or tights (not jeans). I would suggest going 1/2 size up if you have big calves. They are very comfortable as well. Overall for the price and steve madden quality, I highly recommend these boots. They are almost identical to the SW ones.
customer_reviews.author: Iva M

customer_reviews.title: Hot!
customer_reviews.text: They are just perfect!! Love wesring them...look good and fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: COOKIE

customer_reviews.title: Size down on this boot!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend sizing down on this boot. I usually am a 6.5 but I got a 6 and their still a little on the loose side.. even while wearing thicker socks. Color is as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: design was bad, couldnt tell which boot when on what
customer_reviews.text: very low quality. design was bad, couldnt tell which boot when on what foot
customer_reviews.author: KRRH

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! True to size, perfect for winter and fall. I didn’t have any issues with them slouching down either.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt fir me but my sister and mom loved it
customer_reviews.author: LEJ

customer_reviews.title: I think these are knock offs
customer_reviews.text: I do not think these are actually Steve Madden boots. They are very loose and barely stay up. They are made of a cheap material and are not very flattering. Not my fave.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfortable! Love these! I usually wear a 7.5, which is what I ordered. They fit perfectly, even with a pair of socks. They look and feel expensive.
customer_reviews.author: dgd

customer_reviews.title: Fake Steve Madden Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fake. When received they looked cheap and had a different sole than what’s advertised. The left picture is the real advertised sole and to the right are the fakes that I received. Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: keleen

customer_reviews.title: my favorite boots i get compliments on them everytime i wear ...
customer_reviews.text: my favorite boots i get compliments on them everytime i wear them i am considering getting another pair in case i ruin these or out wear them
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, the person who received it, loved, and fitted perfectly, really nice material
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Favorite boots!! They are super cute with dresses and jeans!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay up at all!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful but terribly uncomfortable and the boot leg doesn’t stay up at all. As I was walking around it slipped down further and further so technically it just oooked like a slouchy boot, both over-the-knee at all. It was too warm to wear these around when I bought them so unfortunately it’s too late to return them. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zac + Ellie Thill

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered a half size smaller and the boots fit great. They are nice looking boots
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews so I ordered a half size smaller and the boots fit great. They are nice looking boots. They go high, almost mid thigh (I'm about 5'4"), too sexy for work. ;) But they are very uncomfortable, the heel is not too high and I'm used to wearing very high heels, but this particular heel is very uncomfortable to me. Not sure why. Maybe because there's no platform on the sole. I wasn't able to wear them too long. I wish I could return them, I probably won't get to use them much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem like a knock off and if fits beautifully as expected
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time! Does not seem like a knock off and if fits beautifully as expected! So excited!
customer_reviews.author: Lüxe

customer_reviews.title: Looooooove these!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous to order these. This is the only pair of shoes I have ordered that actually fit! And they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot !!
customer_reviews.text: This boot is exactly what was described and is a very food material .
customer_reviews.author: Stacy OBryan

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Not a lot of cushion in the boot so that sucks but I also have long toes so it's not entirely the shoes' fault. The length of the boot stays up on my thigh easily
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Make you feel gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, sexy and comfortable always a great combo. Wear with skinny jeans, tights or with a dress.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Fits as expected. I have worn boots with jeans and leggings.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot perfect for muscular/wide calfs. Didn't slouch. Comfortable to walk in. Lots of compliments. ❤
customer_reviews.author: sharee

customer_reviews.title: As expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this boots for a gift & my aunt is head over heels for them!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Heel was broken
customer_reviews.text: The boots were the right size and color, but when she tried them on, one of the heels was wobbly, and when she removed them, she could see it was broken. I will send it back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Corn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Feels really cheaply made. Put padding on the toes and wore bandages on my feet, but I can’t feel two my toes and have horrible blisters after only a few hours of wear. Additionally, the heel broke after only a few hours of wear. Extremely irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: i wanted to really like it but just a tiny bit awkward in the ...
customer_reviews.text: i wanted to really like it but just a tiny bit awkward in the heel area for me. I'm already tall so these heels are just too much on me. Bummer, had to return
customer_reviews.author: itscmr

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! It was exactly what I wanted and it looks great. Had it for a while now and it is still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mayara Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: I love the boots
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots! I wear 8 1/2 but this thing runs a size and a half too big. I got a 7 1/2 but I should've gotten a 7. Nothing that some padded socks and some cushions can't fix!
customer_reviews.author: Hallsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome, they look great and stay nice and tall/straight
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Trying on the SW Highlands FIRST was a bad idea.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't fond of the slouching at the ankle and felt that the top of the shaft should've been tighter. I had tried on the SW Highlands and loved how they hugged my legs. Was hoping that these, although at a MUCH lower price point, would be an adequate substitute...but wasn't impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size down, like many of the reviews insisted, but I'm convinced they are true to size. Beautiful boots though! I'm 5'9" and I do wish they were a couple inches taller, because they were only about 2-3" above the knee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot, I ordered a size down and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boot, I ordered a size down and it fit well. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because there is no sole/cushion inside the boot. The heel of my foot felt uncomfortable before I even left the house. I had to pull a last minute macgyver move and put a sock inside the boot to give my heel some relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Soooo sexy. Love these boots with skirts and leggings. Looks funny with jeans. It doesn't bunch too much on the ankle. Isn't baggy like some pics. Kind of a pain to get on and off especially after a few drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Bananana

customer_reviews.title: Slides down.
customer_reviews.text: The boot doesn’t stay up. It slides down. Other than that it’s a pretty boot.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fav boots!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boot! These fit well and look so great. Pretty computable for a high heel Boot as well. I love these and wear them all the time. Great material and well made.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, do not match color in the taupe pictures
customer_reviews.text: The boots are super comfortable and they look great. Giving three stars because based on picture I was expecting more of a beige color and they are pretty gray. Will likely end up exchanging for a black pair.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: These boots are exactly what I was looking for . Very pleased with my purchase !

customer_reviews.text: they are really pretty, but tie came out of back - can't get it back in and they run nearly a size and a half big!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Found these on Amazon after finding a pair in Marshall's that weren't the right size. These are great! My daughter loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my real size, fit like a glove. The foot part is a Bit narrow at first but it stretches after a few wear. Bought taupe and black, both were perfect! 👌🏽

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes! But I got a half size smaller ...

customer_reviews.title: YES!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: ... quickly the item came and how it was in great shape. True Steve Madden boots
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for how quickly the item came and how it was in great shape. True Steve Madden boots. I had tried them on at Nordstrom before buying them on amazon, so I had already known my size thank gosh. Order a 1/2 size to a full size smaller than you normally are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: sent them back the same day as received. looked like someone had already tried them on and sent them back as well -- slightly scuffed. i would not order a size down, maybe a half size at MOST if you would still like to wear socks. very slouchy on me. would look cute on someone, but not the look i was going for.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: The arch is a bit uncomfortable but I love the boot & the color.

customer_reviews.text: I have struggled to find an over the knee boot that actually goes over my knee (I'm 5'7"). These boots actually do, don't hit at a weird spot, and are SUPER cute. I don't think the height is too high, but I'm also used to wearing heels. I think these are totally worth the buy.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & On Trend = One Happy Bargain Hunter
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Saw Nordstrom was running a sale on these but figured I should check on Amazon first and am so happy I did! I got them for about half of what Nordstrom's was charging at full price and $10 or $20 less than their sale price! Fit was great and they're so on trend and sexy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable for a few hours. Got them in a black color, look good. They are a bit bigger, i usually wear a 7.5 and got a 7 which fits perfect. They are loose where the tie is but it's manageable. Look great with dress or over jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee High boots
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before I bought them and glad I did, size a half size down. I'm mostly a 6.5 in other shoes and heels even other steve madden one's. But these fit better the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alonso

customer_reviews.title: The best OTK boots I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are super cute and look hot to trot! They stay up unlike other over the knee boots that I constantly have to keep tugging on. These are definitely a must purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but they don't stay up. And because ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but they don't stay up. And because it slouches unevenly, I found myself constantly having to fix one leg or the other. it was such a hassle, it made me not want to wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy1987

customer_reviews.title: Baggy at the ankle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size down and the length of the footbed was fine for me. However, these boots were baggy at the ankle and fit properly at the calf and thigh. Just not the look I was going for at all. I previously tried the Calvin Klein Bisma: it was baggy throughout the leg. Stuart Weitzman Highland costs significantly more, but if you want a boot that is fitted from the ankle to the thigh, then it is worth the extra cost in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kariann

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit and Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these boots, they felt cheap to me and they also fit weird. Narrow foot, and were baggy instead of staying up nicely on my legs. As soon as I tried them on I knew I would be uncomfortable if I wore them more than a few minutes, and I wear heels daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sexy boot!
customer_reviews.text: I've had so many complements on these boots! Perfect to wear with short dresses or leggings. They're pretty thin, so I like to wear warm socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Glocephus82

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Gorgeous Boot
product_meta.description:
Over-the-knee suede boot

What began as a modest $1100 investment in 1990 has developed into one of the most iconic brands in footwear. From a factory in Queens, NY, Steve Madden has revolutionized the shoe industry, merging years of experience with unique and creative designs. Inspired by rock and roll and his New York roots, his vision to provide on-trend women and men with an outlet to express their individuality is innovative, daring, and inspiring. Steve’s innate understanding of trends and unparalleled willpower have resulted in millions of customers worldwide and propelled his designs to the forefront of fashion. He has expanded the Steve Madden brand into a true lifestyle and destination for footwear, handbags and accessories, sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It’s about authenticity. It’s about embracing individuality. It’s Steve Madden.
